title: DJ SONA music gets muted when Aurelion Sol is nearby
body:
When Aurelion sol is nearby and you're playing on the team/as DJ Sona when he uses abilities your music will be either completely muted or the volume will drop to nearly muted.

I reported this bug months ago guys come on really? This is extremely annoying.

replies.body:
Its for the enemy team only I believe I hear it every single time theres a SOL on the enemy team. 

Try it on the enemy team.

Hey Colgate Minuette -

Thanks for the report! 

I followed your repro steps and I'm still able to hear DJ Sona's music with AS on my team using skills. Are there perhaps other conditions for this bug to occur? Any additional information you can provide would be greatly appreciated! ^-^
